short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a Sticky note on the Page when invoked using Shift+ALT+N.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What's New in Version 2.4:

-Fixed Alignment of the elements Options.html page
-Added support for Renaming the Notes 
- Upcoming features in 2.6: Dark Mode support and Redesigned options.html page

Say goodbye to switching between apps while working in Chrome. With the Browser Sticky Notes extension, you can quickly jot down notes directly in your browser. It's fast, lightweight, and always accessibleâ€”perfect for staying organized and productive.

Key Features:
-Instantly open a sticky notes popup from the top-right corner of your browser.
-Lightweight and user-friendly design for seamless note-taking.
-Ideal for quick reminders, to-do lists, or brainstorming ideas.
-Export your notes in TXT format with the option to disable this feature.
-Customize your experience with a variety of palette colors.

Start taking notes effortlessly without leaving your browser. Download now and boost your productivity!
